family.name: carts
family.description: A cart's line items is a collection of [items][items] that have been added to a cart. A line item can have one or more of the same [items][items] in it. For example, one line item can have seven Rocker T-Shirt or a single Rocker T-Shirt, but it won't have one Rocker T-Shirt and a song track. The song track and T-shirt would be in separate line items.

uri-part.name: line-item-id
uri-part.description:
The line item identifier. This ID is a unique number assigned by Cortex API when the [item][items]is added to a cart.
